verses.verse: ( The Triumphal Entry) ( ( 450 9:9-13 ; 480 11:1-11 ; 490 19:28-40 ; 500 12:12-19 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - ὅτε <WG3753> hote As ἤγγισαν <WG1448> ēngisan they approached εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἦλθον <WG2064> ēlthon came εἰς <WG1519> eis to Βηθφαγὴ <WG967> Bēthphagē Bethphage εἰς <WG1519> eis on τὸ <WG3588> to the ὄρος <WG3735> oros Mount τῶν <WG3588> tōn - Ἐλαιῶν <WG1636> Elaiōn of Olives , τότε <WG5119> tote - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus ἀπέστειλεν <WG649> apesteilen sent out δύο <WG1417> dyo two μαθητὰς <WG3101> mathētas disciples ,

λέγων <WG3004> legōn saying αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Πορεύεσθε <WG4198> Poreuesthe “ Go εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the κώμην <WG2968> kōmēn village τὴν <WG3588> tēn - κατέναντι <WG2713> katenanti ahead ὑμῶν <WG4771> hymōn of you , καὶ <WG2532> kai and εὐθέως* <WG2112> eutheōs at once εὑρήσετε <WG2147> heurēsete you will find ὄνον <WG3688> onon a donkey δεδεμένην <WG1210> dedemenēn tied [there] , καὶ <WG2532> kai with πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon [her] colt μετ’ <WG3326> met’ beside αὐτῆς <WG846> autēs her . λύσαντες <WG3089> lysantes Untie [them] ἀγάγετέ <WG71> agagete [and] bring [them] μοι <WG1473> moi to Me .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐάν <WG1437> ean If τις <WG5100> tis anyone ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , εἴπῃ <WG2036> eipē questions τι <WG5100> ti . . . ἐρεῖτε <WG2046> ereite tell [him] ὅτι <WG3754> hoti that Ὁ <WG3588> HO the Κύριος <WG2962> Kyrios Lord αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them , χρείαν <WG5532> chreian needs ἔχει <WG2192> echei vvv εὐθὺς <WG2112> euthys right away . ” δὲ <WG1161> de and ἀποστελεῖ <WG649> apostelei he will send αὐτούς <WG846> autous them

Τοῦτο <WG3778> Touto This δὲ <WG1161> de - γέγονεν <WG1096> gegonen took place ἵνα <WG2443> hina to πληρωθῇ <WG4137> plērōthē fulfill τὸ <WG3588> to what ῥηθὲν <WG2046> rhēthen was spoken διὰ <WG1223> dia through τοῦ <WG3588> tou the προφήτου <WG4396> prophētou prophet λέγοντος <WG3004> legontos - :

Εἴπατε <WG2036> Eipate “ Say τῇ <WG3588> tē to the θυγατρὶ <WG2364> thygatri Daughter Σιών <WG4622> Siōn of Zion , Ἰδοὺ <WG2400> Idou ‘ See , ὁ <WG3588> ho - Βασιλεύς <WG935> Basileus King σου <WG4771> sou your ἔρχεταί <WG2064> erchetai comes σοι <WG4771> soi to you , πραῢς <WG4239> praus gentle καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπιβεβηκὼς <WG1910> epibebēkōs riding ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on ὄνον <WG3688> onon a donkey , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi on πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon a colt , υἱὸν <WG5207> huion [the] foal ὑποζυγίου <WG5268> hypozygiou of a donkey .’” ( )

Πορευθέντες <WG4198> Poreuthentes went δὲ <WG1161> de So οἱ <WG3588> hoi the μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples καὶ <WG2532> kai and ποιήσαντες <WG4160> poiēsantes did καθὼς <WG2531> kathōs as συνέταξεν <WG4929> synetaxen had directed αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois them . ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus

ἤγαγον <WG71> ēgagon They brought τὴν <WG3588> tēn the ὄνον <WG3688> onon donkey καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὸν <WG3588> ton the πῶλον <WG4454> pōlon colt καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπέθηκαν <WG2007> epethēkan laid ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ on αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them , τὰ <WG3588> ta their ἱμάτια <WG2440> himatia cloaks καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐπεκάθισεν <WG1940> epekathisen [Jesus] sat ἐπάνω <WG1883> epanō on αὐτῶν <WG846> autōn them .

Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - πλεῖστος <WG4118> pleistos A massive ὄχλος <WG3793> ochlos crowd ἔστρωσαν <WG4766> estrōsan spread ἑαυτῶν <WG1438> heautōn their τὰ <WG3588> ta - ἱμάτια <WG2440> himatia cloaks ἐν <WG1722> en on τῇ <WG3588> tē the ὁδῷ <WG3598> hodō road , ἄλλοι <WG243> alloi others δὲ <WG1161> de while ἔκοπτον <WG2875> ekopton cut κλάδους <WG2798> kladous branches ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from τῶν <WG3588> tōn the δένδρων <WG1186> dendrōn trees καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐστρώννυον <WG4766> estrōnnyon spread [them] ἐν <WG1722> en on τῇ <WG3588> tē the ὁδῷ <WG3598> hodō road .

Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi The δὲ <WG1161> de - ὄχλοι <WG3793> ochloi crowds οἱ <WG3588> hoi that προάγοντες <WG4254> proagontes went ahead αὐτὸν <WG846> auton of Him καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi those that ἀκολουθοῦντες <WG190> akolouthountes followed ἔκραζον <WG2896> ekrazon were shouting λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes - : Ὡσαννὰ <WG5614> Hōsanna “ Hosanna τῷ <WG3588> tō to the υἱῷ <WG5207> huiō Son Δαυίδ <WG1138> Dauid of David !” ( Hosanna is a transliteration of the Hebrew Hosia-na, meaning Save, we pray or Save now, which became a shout of praise; see ; also in verse 15.) Εὐλογημένος <WG2127> Eulogēmenos “ Blessed is ὁ <WG3588> ho He ἐρχόμενος <WG2064> erchomenos who comes ἐν <WG1722> en in ὀνόματι <WG3686> onomati [the] name Κυρίου <WG2962> Kyriou of [the] Lord !” ( ) Ὡσαννὰ <WG5614> Hōsanna “ Hosanna ἐν <WG1722> en in τοῖς <WG3588> tois the ὑψίστοις <WG5310> hypsistois highest !” ( Or “Hosanna in the highest heaven!” See and .)

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - εἰσελθόντος <WG1525> eiselthontos had entered αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou When [Jesus] εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . Ἱεροσόλυμα <WG2414> Hierosolyma Jerusalem , ἐσείσθη <WG4579> eseisthē was stirred πᾶσα <WG3956> pasa whole ἡ <WG3588> hē the πόλις <WG4172> polis city λέγουσα <WG3004> legousa [and] asked , Τίς <WG5101> Tis “ Who ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is οὗτος <WG3778> houtos this ? ”

Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi The δὲ <WG1161> de - ὄχλοι <WG3793> ochloi crowds ἔλεγον <WG2036> elegon replied , Οὗτός <WG3778> Houtos “ This ἐστιν <WG1510> estin is ὁ <WG3588> ho the προφήτης <WG4396> prophētēs prophet Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus , ὁ <WG3588> ho - ἀπὸ <WG575> apo from Ναζαρὲθ <WG3478> Nazareth Nazareth τῆς <WG3588> tēs - Γαλιλαίας <WG1056> Galilaias in Galilee . ”

( Jesus Cleanses the Temple) ( ( 480 11:15-19 ; 490 19:45-48 ; 500 2:12-25 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then εἰσῆλθεν <WG1525> eisēlthen entered Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸ <WG3588> to the ἱερόν <WG2411> hieron temple [courts] ( Literally the temple; also in verses 15 and 23; BYZ and TR the temple of God) καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐξέβαλεν <WG1544> exebalen drove out πάντας <WG3956> pantas all τοὺς <WG3588> tous who were πωλοῦντας <WG4453> pōlountas selling καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἀγοράζοντας <WG59> agorazontas buying ἐν <WG1722> en [there] τῷ <WG3588> tō . . . ἱερῷ <WG2411> hierō . . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai - τὰς <WG3588> tas the τραπέζας <WG5132> trapezas tables τῶν <WG3588> tōn of the κολλυβιστῶν <WG2855> kollybistōn money changers κατέστρεψεν <WG2690> katestrepsen He overturned καὶ <WG2532> kai and τὰς <WG3588> tas the καθέδρας <WG2515> kathedras seats τῶν <WG3588> tōn of those πωλούντων <WG4453> pōlountōn selling τὰς <WG3588> tas - περιστεράς <WG4058> peristeras doves .

καὶ <WG2532> kai And λέγει <WG3004> legei He declared αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois to them , Γέγραπται <WG1125> Gegraptai “ It is written : Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - οἶκός <WG3624> oikos house μου <WG1473> mou ‘ My οἶκος <WG3624> oikos a house προσευχῆς <WG4335> proseuchēs of prayer .’ ( ) κληθήσεται <WG2564> klēthēsetai will be called ὑμεῖς <WG4771> hymeis you δὲ <WG1161> de But αὐτὸν <WG846> auton it ποιεῖτε <WG4160> poieite are making Σπήλαιον <WG4693> Spēlaion ‘ a den λῃστῶν <WG3027> lēstōn of robbers .’ ” ( )

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai - προσῆλθον <WG4334> prosēlthon came αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to Him τυφλοὶ <WG5185> typhloi [The] blind καὶ <WG2532> kai and χωλοὶ <WG5560> chōloi [the] lame ἐν <WG1722> en at τῷ <WG3588> tō the ἱερῷ <WG2411> hierō temple , καὶ <WG2532> kai and ἐθεράπευσεν <WG2323> etherapeusen He healed αὐτούς <WG846> autous them .

ἰδόντες <WG3708> idontes when they saw δὲ <WG1161> de But οἱ <WG3588> hoi the ἀρχιερεῖς <WG749> archiereis chief priests καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - γραμματεῖς <WG1122> grammateis scribes τὰ <WG3588> ta the θαυμάσια <WG2297> thaumasia wonders ἃ <WG3739> ha - ἐποίησεν <WG4160> epoiēsen He performed καὶ <WG2532> kai and τοὺς <WG3588> tous the παῖδας <WG3816> paidas children τοὺς <WG3588> tous vvv κράζοντας <WG2896> krazontas shouting ἐν <WG1722> en in τῷ <WG3588> tō the ἱερῷ <WG2411> hierō temple [courts] , καὶ <WG2532> kai vvv λέγοντας <WG3004> legontas vvv Ὡσαννὰ <WG5614> Hōsanna “ Hosanna τῷ <WG3588> tō to the υἱῷ <WG5207> huiō Son Δαυίδ <WG1138> Dauid of David ! ” ἠγανάκτησαν <WG23> ēganaktēsan were indignant

καὶ <WG2532> kai - εἶπαν <WG2036> eipan they asked αὐτῷ <WG846> autō - . Ἀκούεις <WG191> Akoueis “ Do you hear τί <WG5101> ti what οὗτοι <WG3778> houtoi these [children] λέγουσιν <WG3004> legousin are saying ? ” Ὁ <WG3588> Ho - δὲ <WG1161> de - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus λέγει <WG3004> legei answered αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois - . Ναί <WG3483> Nai “ Yes , ” οὐδέποτε <WG3763> oudepote vvv ἀνέγνωτε <WG314> anegnōte “ Have you never read : ὅτι <WG3754> hoti - Ἐκ <WG1537> Ek ‘ From στόματος <WG4750> stomatos [the] mouths νηπίων <WG3516> nēpiōn of children καὶ <WG2532> kai and θηλαζόντων <WG2337> thēlazontōn infants Κατηρτίσω <WG2675> Katērtisō You have ordained αἶνον <WG136> ainon praise ’ ?” ( (see also LXX))

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai Then καταλιπὼν <WG2641> katalipōn He left αὐτοὺς <WG846> autous them ἐξῆλθεν <WG1831> exēlthen [and] went ἔξω <WG1854> exō out of τῆς <WG3588> tēs the πόλεως <WG4172> poleōs city εἰς <WG1519> eis to Βηθανίαν <WG963> Bēthanian Bethany , καὶ <WG2532> kai - ηὐλίσθη <WG835> ēulisthē where He spent the night ἐκεῖ <WG1563> ekei . . . .

Πρωῒ <WG4404> Prōi In the morning , ( The Barren Fig Tree) δὲ <WG1161> de - ἐπανάγων* <WG1877> epanagōn as [Jesus] was returning εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὴν <WG3588> tēn the πόλιν <WG4172> polin city , ἐπείνασεν <WG3983> epeinasen He was hungry .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - ἰδὼν <WG3708> idōn Seeing συκῆν <WG4808> sykēn fig tree μίαν <WG1520> mian a ἐπὶ <WG1909> epi by τῆς <WG3588> tēs the ὁδοῦ <WG3598> hodou road , ἦλθεν <WG2064> ēlthen He went up ἐπ’ <WG1909> ep’ to αὐτήν <WG846> autēn it καὶ <WG2532> kai but οὐδὲν <WG3762> ouden nothing εὗρεν <WG2147> heuren found ἐν <WG1722> en on αὐτῇ <WG846> autē it εἰ <WG1487> ei except μὴ <WG3361> mē . . . φύλλα <WG5444> phylla leaves . μόνον <WG3440> monon . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai - λέγει <WG3004> legei He said αὐτῇ <WG846> autē - . 〈Οὐ〉 <WG3756> Ou “ vvv μηκέτι <WG3371> mēketi again ! ” ἐκ <WG1537> ek . . . σοῦ <WG4771> sou . . . καρπὸς <WG2590> karpos fruit γένηται <WG1096> genētai May you never bear εἰς <WG1519> eis . . . τὸν <WG3588> ton . . . αἰῶνα <WG165> aiōna . . . καὶ <WG2532> kai And ἐξηράνθη <WG3583> exēranthē withered . παραχρῆμα <WG3916> parachrēma immediately ἡ <WG3588> hē the συκῆ <WG4808> sykē tree

Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When ἰδόντες <WG3708> idontes saw [this] , οἱ <WG3588> hoi the μαθηταὶ <WG3101> mathētai disciples ἐθαύμασαν <WG2296> ethaumasan they marveled λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes [and] asked , Πῶς <WG4459> Pōs “ How did παραχρῆμα <WG3916> parachrēma so quickly ? ” ἐξηράνθη <WG3583> exēranthē wither ἡ <WG3588> hē the συκῆ <WG4808> sykē fig tree

Ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> Apokritheis replied δὲ <WG1161> de - ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen . . . αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois . . . , Ἀμὴν <WG281> Amēn “ Truly λέγω <WG3004> legō I tell ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you , ” ἐὰν <WG1437> ean “ if ἔχητε <WG2192> echēte you have πίστιν <WG4102> pistin faith καὶ <WG2532> kai and μὴ <WG3361> mē do not διακριθῆτε <WG1252> diakrithēte doubt , οὐ <WG3756> ou not μόνον <WG3440> monon only τὸ <WG3588> to what was done τῆς <WG3588> tēs to the συκῆς <WG4808> sykēs fig tree , ποιήσετε <WG4160> poiēsete will you do ἀλλὰ <WG235> alla but κἂν <WG2579> kan even if τῷ <WG3588> tō - ὄρει <WG3735> orei mountain , τούτῳ <WG3778> toutō to this εἴπητε <WG2036> eipēte you say Ἄρθητι <WG142> Arthēti ‘ Be lifted up καὶ <WG2532> kai and βλήθητι <WG906> blēthēti thrown εἰς <WG1519> eis into τὴν <WG3588> tēn the θάλασσαν <WG2281> thalassan sea , ’ γενήσεται <WG1096> genēsetai it will happen .

καὶ <WG2532> kai - πάντα <WG3956> panta whatever ὅσα <WG3745> hosa . . . ἂν <WG302> an . . . αἰτήσητε <WG154> aitēsēte you ask for ἐν <WG1722> en in τῇ <WG3588> tē - προσευχῇ <WG4335> proseuchē prayer . ” πιστεύοντες <WG4100> pisteuontes If you believe , λήμψεσθε <WG2983> lēmpsesthe you will receive

( Jesus’ Authority Challenged) ( ( 480 11:27-33 ; 490 20:1-8 )) Καὶ <WG2532> Kai When ἐλθόντος <WG2064> elthontos returned αὐτοῦ <WG846> autou [Jesus] εἰς <WG1519> eis to τὸ <WG3588> to the ἱερὸν <WG2411> hieron temple [courts] προσῆλθον <WG4334> prosēlthon came up αὐτῷ <WG846> autō to Him . διδάσκοντι <WG1321> didaskonti [and] began to teach , οἱ <WG3588> hoi the ἀρχιερεῖς <WG749> archiereis chief priests καὶ <WG2532> kai and οἱ <WG3588> hoi - πρεσβύτεροι <WG4245> presbyteroi elders τοῦ <WG3588> tou of the λαοῦ <WG2992> laou people λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes they asked . Ἐν <WG1722> En “ By ποίᾳ <WG4169> poia what ἐξουσίᾳ <WG1849> exousia authority ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things ? ” ποιεῖς <WG4160> poieis are You doing καὶ <WG2532> kai “ And τίς <WG5101> tis who σοι <WG4771> soi You ἔδωκεν <WG1325> edōken gave τὴν <WG3588> tēn - ἐξουσίαν <WG1849> exousian authority ? ” ταύτην <WG3778> tautēn this

Ἀποκριθεὶς <WG611> Apokritheis replied δὲ <WG1161> de - ὁ <WG3588> ho - Ἰησοῦς <WG2424> Iēsous Jesus εἶπεν <WG2036> eipen - αὐτοῖς <WG846> autois - , Ἐρωτήσω <WG2065> Erōtēsō I will also ask ὑμᾶς <WG4771> hymas you κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō “ vvv λόγον <WG3056> logon question , ” ἕνα <WG1520> hena one ὃν <WG3739> hon “ - ἐὰν <WG1437> ean and if εἴπητέ <WG2036> eipēte you answer μοι <WG1473> moi Me , κἀγὼ <WG2504> kagō I ὑμῖν <WG4771> hymin you ἐρῶ <WG2046> erō will tell ἐν <WG1722> en by ποίᾳ <WG4169> poia what ἐξουσίᾳ <WG1849> exousia authority ταῦτα <WG3778> tauta these things . ποιῶ <WG4160> poiō I am doing

τὸ <WG3588> to - βάπτισμα <WG908> baptisma baptism ? τὸ <WG3588> to of Ἰωάννου <WG2491> Iōannou John’s πόθεν <WG4159> pothen What was the source ἦν <WG1510> ēn . . . ἐξ <WG1537> ex [Was it] from οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven ἢ <WG2228> ē or ἐξ <WG1537> ex from ἀνθρώπων <WG444> anthrōpōn men ? ” Οἱ <WG3588> Hoi - δὲ <WG1161> de - διελογίζοντο <WG1260> dielogizonto They deliberated ἐν <WG1722> en among ἑαυτοῖς <WG1438> heautois themselves λέγοντες <WG3004> legontes [and] said , Ἐὰν <WG1437> Ean “ If εἴπωμεν <WG2036> eipōmen we say , Ἐξ <WG1537> Ex ‘ From οὐρανοῦ <WG3772> ouranou heaven , ’ ἐρεῖ <WG2046> erei He will ask ἡμῖν <WG1473> hēmin - , Διὰ <WG1223> Dia ‘ Why τί <WG5101> ti . . . οὖν <WG3767> oun then οὐκ <WG3756> ouk vvv ἐπιστεύσατε <WG4100> episteusate did you not believe αὐτῷ <WG846> autō him ? ’
